attributes.action: Ignore the "SAY NO TO THE ORMSKIRK BYPASS AND PROTECT RURAL ORMSKIRK"  petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
While the proposed Ormskirk Bypass Scheme is not going to suit everyone, it is the most cohesive and sensible plan yet proposed. There will be some loss of farmland etc, but the area surrounding Ormskirk is hardly short of it.

This road will allow for better transport of people and goods around the local area, and will remove many of the lorries from the roads of Ormskirk town centre.

Ormskirk and the area needs this bypass to be built.

Please sign this petition to ensure that the the "No" petition is ignored.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
